tool.name: OGS: OGSFileConverter
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'OGSFileConverter'.
tool.command: if [ "$gmsh_path" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$gmsh_path.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$gmsh_path' '${$gmsh_path.element_identifier}'; fi; OGSFileConverter #if str($gmsh_path).strip() != 'None' and str($gmsh_path).strip() != '': --gmsh-path '$gmsh_path.element_identifier' #end if

param.name: gmsh_path
param.label: gmsh path
param.help: Input (.msh). The path to the input gmsh binary file

tool.help: This tool runs the **OGSFileConverter** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
